main event: Three UFOs were sighted in the night sky over Shreveport, Louisiana, on 6 November 1957, displaying brightly lighted, green flashing lights.
interesting points: The objects were in close formation with one seeming to tow another object,One object went north while another went south,One disappeared without trace,The sighting lasted between 5-10 minutes,The case appears to involve radar reports that were identified as errors.
sighted object: three white, brightly lighted, green flashing lights
